sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid class="mt-5 myContainer">
    <v-card class="myCard">
      <v-row style="height:100%">
        <v-col class="containerMenuAside" sm="2">
          <menu-aside />
        </v-col>
        <v-col sm="9">
          <v-container>
            <v-row>
              <v-col>
                <InputSearchNote @onSearchNote="searchNote"/>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-row>
              <v-col sm="4" v-for="item in allNotes" v-bind:key="item.noteTitle" v-show="item.show">
                <CardNote :title="item.noteTitle"
                          :description="item.noteDescription"
                          :date="item.date" />
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>
          <FormNewNote @onSaveNote="saveNota"/>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
     
    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import FormNewNote from "../components/Notes/FormNewNote.vue"
import InputSearchNote from "../components/Notes/InputSearchNote.vue"
import CardNote from "../components/Notes/CardNote.vue"
import MenuAside from "../components/MenuAside.vue";
export default {
  name: "Home",
  data: () => ({
    allNotes:[
    {
      idNote:1,
      noteTitle: "My first note",
      noteDescription: "You can now download an archive of all your data within the next 24 hours.",
      priorityLevel:'Low',
      itsDone: true,
      date: "13/09/2022",
      status: true,
      show: true
    },
    {
      idNote:2,
      noteTitle: "My second note",
      noteDescription: "This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption.This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption.",
      priorityLevel:'Medium',
      itsDone: false,
      date: "15/09/2022",
      status: true,
      show: true
    }],
  }),
  methods:{
    saveNota(newNota){
      this.allNotes.push(newNota)
    },
    searchNote(txtSearch){
      for(let i=0; i<this.allNotes.length;i++){
        if(this.allNotes[i].noteTitle.toLowerCase().includes(txtSearch.toLowerCase()) ||
           this.allNotes[i].noteDescription.toLowerCase().includes(txtSearch.toLowerCase()) ||
           this.allNotes[i].priorityLevel.toLowerCase().includes(txtSearch.toLowerCase())){
          this.allNotes[i].show = true
        }
        else{
          this.allNotes[i].show = false
        }
      }
    }
  },
  components: {
    MenuAside,
    FormNewNote,
    InputSearchNote,
    CardNote
  },
};
</script>

<style>
  .v-application--wrap{
    background: url("../assets/fondoBG.jpg");
  }
  .myContainer, .myCard{
    height: 87vh !important;
    width: 95vw;
  }
  .myCard{
    /* background-color: #F8F9FD; */
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;
  }
  .containerMenuAside{
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
  .v-btn--absolute.v-btn--bottom, .v-btn--fixed.v-btn--bottom{
    bottom: 70px;
  }
  .v-btn--absolute.v-btn--right, .v-btn--fixed.v-btn--right {
    right: 65px;
  }
    /* .v-overlay__scrim{
      opacity: 0.6 !important;
    }  */
</style>
